title: Pimlyco. Or, Runne Red-cap Tis a mad world at Hogsdon.
author: Skelton, John, 1460?-1529.
publisher: Printed [by Thomas Purfoot] for Io: Busbie, and Geo: Loftis, and are to bee sould vnder St. Peters Church in Cornehill,
notes: Includes "The tunning of Elynor Rumming" by John Skelton.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
